page.title: 18Mammals around Stonegate
page.content: There are many kinds of mammal to be found around Stonegate. In the summer bats can be seen late in the evening.Some bats live in the church. Poultry are kept on many of the farms and so,because of this,there are many foxes.At least two of our hens are killed by foxes each year. Badgers are not often seen or heard. The last time I saw badgers,I saw two badgers fighting,but when they saw me they ran off in opposite directions. Rabbits are common around Stonegate. One of our neighbours feeds the wild rabbits,which have now become quite tame,even coming right up to the front door to be fed.A rabbit has dug a burrow next to the house,and raised two litters of baby rabbits in one year.
